attributes.action: commission a piece of art to be displayed in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This piece of art should be representative of the UKs diversity and ideally will be a picture.  The picture, once complete will be sent around the country to be put on display at major Cities.

The picture should depict a diety from every religion in the UK - Eg. Muslim, Christian, Jewish, Quaker, Mormon, Pagan, Voodoo etc., and the dieties should be doing an activity together, like having a picnic.

This sounds a bit silly but I think it would show that we are serious about the UKs diverse peoples (and integration thereof).  This giant picture would be a world first and would really go-miles to show how the UK is leading the world in race-tolerance and cultural acceptance.
